root.name: Anomaly 2
root.description: OverviewAnomaly 2 continues the story of invasion by mechanical aliens with minimal gameplay changes and brand new multiplayer mode labeled as tower offense vs tower defense. The game was officially announced on February 28th 2013, and is heading to PC Mac and Linux later in the year. Anomaly 2 is split into 14 single player missions that are spread over three distinctive environments. Post-apocalyptic New York, Brazil and Antarctic.
